\begin{verbatim}
Definition of lexer CastTwoLexer, which is a subclass of CharScanner.

/** Lexer nextToken rule:
 *  The lexer nextToken rule is synthesized from all of the user-defined
 *  lexer rules.  It logically consists of one big alternative block with
 *  each user-defined rule being an alternative.
 */
mARROW 
|   mEXP 
|   mPLUS 
|   mMINUS 
|   mTIMES 
|   mDIV 
|   mMOD 
|   mAND 
|   mOR 
|   mXOR 
|   mNOT 
|   mCOMMA 
|   mSEMI 
|   mCOLON 
|   mASSIGN 
|   mEQ 
|   mNE 
|   mLT 
|   mLE 
|   mGE 
|   mGT 
|   mLPAREN 
|   mRPAREN 
|   mLCURLY 
|   mRCURLY 
|   mLBRACK 
|   mRBRACK 
|   mDOT 
|   mDOTDOT 
|   mPOUND 
|   mCELEM_ARROW 
|   mCOMB_ARROW 
|   mLT_AND 
|   mLT_OR 
|   mLT_COMMA 
|   mWS 
|   mCOMMENT_1 
|   mCOMMENT_2 
|   mIDENT 
|   mNUM_INT 
|   mDOT_IDENT 
|   mQuotedString 
|   mESCAPED_VERILOG_IDENT 
mARROW
    :   "->" 
    ;

mEXP
    :   "**" 
    ;

mPLUS
    :   '+' 
    ;

mMINUS
    :   '-' 
    ;

mTIMES
    :   '*' 
    ;

mDIV
    :   '/' 
    ;

mMOD
    :   '%' 
    ;

mAND
    :   '&' 
    ;

mOR
    :   '|' 
    ;

mXOR
    :   '^' 
    ;

mNOT
    :   '~' 
    ;

mCOMMA
    :   ',' 
    ;

mSEMI
    :   ';' 
    ;

mCOLON
    :   ':' 
    ;

mASSIGN
    :   '=' 
    ;

mEQ
    :   "==" 
    ;

mNE
    :   "!=" 
    ;

mLT
    :   '<' 
    ;

mLE
    :   "<=" 
    ;

mGE
    :   ">=" 
    ;

mGT
    :   '>' 
    ;

mLPAREN
    :   '(' 
    ;

mRPAREN
    :   ')' 
    ;

mLCURLY
    :   '{' 
    ;

mRCURLY
    :   '}' 
    ;

mLBRACK
    :   '[' 
    ;

mRBRACK
    :   ']' 
    ;

mDOT
    :   '.' 
    ;

mDOTDOT
    :   ".." 
    ;

mPOUND
    :   "#" 
    ;

mCELEM_ARROW
    :   "#>" 
    ;

mCOMB_ARROW
    :   "=>" 
    ;

mLT_AND
    :   "<&" 
    ;

mLT_OR
    :   "<|" 
    ;

mLT_COMMA
    :   "<," 
    ;

mWS
    :   (   ' ' 
        |   '\t' 
        |   '\f' 
        |   ( '\n' ) 
        |   '\r' 
        ) 
        
    ;

mCOMMENT_1
    :   "/*" 
        (   '*' 
        |   '\n' 
        |   (   '*' 
            |   '\n' 
            ) 
        )* 
        "*/" 
    ;

mCOMMENT_2
    :   "//" ( ~'\n' )* '\n' 
    ;

mIDENT
    :   mREAL_IDENT 
    |   mESCAPED_IDENT 
    ;

protected mREAL_IDENT
    :   (   mLETTER 
        |   '_' 
        ) 
        (   mLETTER 
        |   '_' 
        |   mDIGIT 
        )* 
        
    ;

protected mESCAPED_IDENT
    :   '"' 
        (   mLETTER 
        |   mDIGIT 
        |   '_' 
        |   '!' 
        )+ 
        '"' 
    ;

protected mLETTER
    :           'a'..'z' 
    |           'A'..'Z' 
    ;

protected mDIGIT
    :           '0'..'9' 
    ;

mNUM_INT
    :   mDIGIT mLETTER 
        (   mDIGIT 
        |   'A' 
        |   'B' 
        |   'C' 
        |   'D' 
        |   'E' 
        |   'F' 
        |   'a' 
        |   'b' 
        |   'c' 
        |   'd' 
        |   'e' 
        |   'f' 
        )+ 
        
    |   ( mDIGIT )+ 
        (   mIDENT 
        |   
        ) 
        (   '.' ( mDIGIT )+ 
            (   mEXPONENT 
            |   
            ) 
            
        |   
        ) 
    ;

protected mEXPONENT
    :   (   'e' 
        |   'E' 
        ) 
        (   '+' 
        |   '-' 
        |   
        ) 
        ( mDIGIT )+ 
    ;

mDOT_IDENT
    :   '.' 
        (   mIDENT 
        |   mNUM_INT 
        ) 
        
    ;

mQuotedString
    :   '\'' ( ~'\'' )* '\'' 
    ;

mESCAPED_VERILOG_IDENT
    :   '\\' ( (  ' ' 
            |   '\t' 
            |   '\n' 
            |   '\r' 
            ) )+ 
    ;
\end{verbatim}
